title: Salem Gates
description: Wren Caldwell is 18 years old when he finds out about his birthright, and a lot of people wished he hadn't. Having moved around all the time since he was born, Wren is finally settling down for his senior year, settling down in the place his mother was raised. There are reasons why his mother left, and theyâ€™re coming back to haunt her.  Witches have the ability to cast spells and be a vessel to magic, they also have the sworn duty to eradicate any male found to practice the divine art of witchcraft.  Wren is thrown in at the deep end of magic as he tries to keep what he's found a secret, but it's a secret that can either break or make the rest of his life.
author: Joseph Hunt
